newsitem.title: USA: Ultramar Diamond Shamrock sets cap budget.
newsitem.headline: Ultramar Diamond Shamrock sets cap budget.

text.p: Ultramar Diamond Shamrock Corp said on Monday its 1997 capital spending budget will be $285 million.
The figure includes $85 million for its Southwest retail and wholesale marketing operations. In this region the company plans to build 22 new Diamond Shamrock stores, mostly in Arizona.
The company also earmarked $28 million for refining projects.
Ultramar and Diamond Shamrock merged last year. Their combined capital spending averaged $430 million before the merger, the company said.
